title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 576/90 of 7 March 1990 fixing for the 1990 marketing year the reference prices for courgettes
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 576/90
of 7 March 1990
fixing for the 1990 marketing year the reference prices for courgettes
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
For the 1990 marketing year, the reference prices for courgettes falling within CN code 0709 90 70, expressed in ecu per 100 kilograms net of packed products of class I, of all sizes, shall be as follows:
- April (21 to 30): 71,79,
- May: 63,12,
- June: 42,18,
- July: 38,63,
- August: 44,99,
- September: 49,68.

This Regulation shall enter into force on 21 April 1990.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 7 March 1990.
For the Commission
Ray MAC SHARRY
Member of the Commission
